name: DIES NATALIS
description:
You come home from... whatever you do
and discover that the door is wide open.
Time to investigate!

From the minds of that strange game with that British guy with the bus and the shower and being fired for being nude... oh drat,what's it called? His name is Shawn and it's a story.... hmmm.....

Anyway, they bring you... you've read the title, you must of ...  sigh  it's called DIES NATALIS.

It's a game. Yep, in fact, if I could pick anyone word to describe this piece of playable media, it would be that! 'game'! 

REVIEWS :

"I've been doing just fine Gotta gotta be down Because I want it" - Mr B.  Side

 It was The Greatest[REDACTED] in the World,
All right! It was the best [REDACTED FOR THE CHILDREN, WON'T SOMEONE THINK OF THEM?]  the greatest [REDACTED]  in the world." -  Miss. Tena D

"You gave me nothing at all But still you're in my way"  -iCarely (rea) (Jepsen)

---

Enjoy.
